timeline.message:
added systeminfo rest resource

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

timeline.bodyText: Looks all good to me! But it would be one less warning when this class is also annotated with @NonNullByDefault ;-)
timeline.author: wborn

+package org.openhab.core.io.rest.internal.resources.beans;
+
+import org.openhab.core.OpenHAB;
+
+/**
+ * This is a java bean that is used to define system information for the REST interface.
+ *
+ * @author Kai Kreuzer - Initial contribution
+ */
+public class SystemInfoBean {
